title: Total population of Russia 2024
summary: This statistic shows the Total population of the Russia from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .
In 2018 , the Total population of the Russia was around 146.8 millions people .
population of the Russia Despite its small size , the Russia is the twenty-third smallest nation in the European Union , and it is one of the most important nations in Europe and the world .
gold: This statistic shows the total population of Russia from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024.
In 2018 , the total population of Russia was around 146.8 million people.
Only a fraction of them live in the major Russian cities .
